mapper.select: select * from post order by post_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into post(post_num, post_title, post_category, post_content, post_usernum, post_like, post_regdate, post_readcount) values( (select NVL(max(post_num),0)+1 from post), #{post_title}, #{post_category}, #{post_content}, #{post_usernum}, 0, sysdate, 0)
mapper.update: update post set post_readcount = post_readcount+1 where post_num = #{post_num}
